bio.about: 6 years Experience in Android programming adapt in all stages of advanced Android development. Knowledgeable in development, debugging and maintenance processe.Proficient in an assortment of technologies, including Java, Dart, Flutter. experience in teaching 2 classes and also leading 5 interns.Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate in a team setting.Familiar with UI/UX principle, also have experience in financial markets and familiar with Crypto currencies NFTâ€™s and Metavers.

experiences.description: Karso application is a comprehensive online application in the field of management and control of personal and commercial business. Attendance, salary, calendar and reminders are some of the basic features that are included in this application

I had the experience of being in a big and famous startup that made me understand the challenges of a big company with big teams and managing an application with a high number of installations. I helped implement the feed, profile, post, search, invoice and other parts in the application

In this great team, I experienced working remotely for almost a year and I was able to overcome its challenges well and establish a good interaction with the team. I also developed good projects that helped me learn more.
